attributes.action: Work internationally to seek to end conflict in the Democratic Republic of Congo
attributes.additional_details: Since 1996 millions of people have lost their lives to this conflict, and citizens continue to suffer in the present day.
attributes.background: The Government should seek through all means at its disposal to bring about the end of conflict in the Democratic Republic of Congo.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/650445
